text: Ivan Sergeyevich Bortnik (; 16 April 1939 – 4 January 2019) was a Soviet and Russian actor. He was a People's Artist of Russia (2000).Указ Президента РФ от 26 июля 2000 года No. 1380 o присвоении почётных званий Российской Федерации He was born in Moscow. He was known for his roles in Family Relations, Mirror for a Hero and in Mama Don't Cry. Bortnik died on 4 January 2019 in Moscow of complications from thrombosis at the age of 79.Умер народный артист России Иван Бортник, TASS; accessed 6 January 2019. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from thrombosis Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian television actors Category:Russian stage actors Category:Actors from Moscow
